title: Juan Pablo Montoya
summary: Juan Pablo Montoya Roldán (Spanish pronunciation: [ˈxwan ˈpaβlo monˈtoʝa rolˈdan]; born September 20, 1975), is a Colombian racing driver. He currently competes in the WeatherTech SportsCar Championship, driving for Acura Meyer Shank Racing, having won the championship in 2019 with Team Penske.
